text: Mouse anti-birch profilin antibody ( 4A6 [ 29 ] ) , rat anti-mouse CD40 ( 1C10 [ 30 ] ) and a rat isotype control antibody ( mAb72 , Developmental Studies Hybridoma Bank , University of Iowa , Iowa City , IA ) were isolated from hybridoma supernatants .
FITC-labeled anti-mouse CD80 and an isotype control Ab were from eBiosciences .
Rabbit anti-HOIP Ab [ 6 ] was the kind gift of Dr . Betty Eipper ( University of Connecticut Health Center , Farmington , Connecticut ) .
Goat anti-rat IgG , and HRP-labeled secondary Abs were from Jackson ImmunoResearch Laboratories , Inc .
All other antibodies used were described previously [ 6 ] .
